[Step Lively](/Feats.aspx?ID=1432) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 46 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
A Large or larger enemy ends a [move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114) action adjacent to you.

</column>

---

You are an expert at avoiding the lumbering footsteps of larger creatures. You Step to another space adjacent to the enemy.

<title level="2">Step Lively leads to...</title>
[Dance Underfoot](/Feats.aspx?ID=1433)
